features: 14" LAYETTE BABY DOLL & ACCESSORY GIFT SET // Perfect for dress up fun, includes diaper, diaper cover, bodysuit, t-shirt, booties, hat and two customizable hospital bracelets for baby and parent
POSEABLE ARMS, LEGS AND HEAD // Jointed at the shoulders, hips, and neck so you can rotate the legs and arms when adding and removing doll's clothing. He is 14" long and weights approx. 1lb 5oz
SAFETY TESTED AND APPROVED // Made from non-scented, BPA free, safety tested vinyl. Soft & smooth to the touch yet durable for years. Water friendly too
TEACHES CHILDREN NURTURING SKILLS // His washable and posable body promotes holding, cuddling and special care. He is the perfect size for children to hug and love
MADE BY JC TOYS // A USA Family run, award-winning baby doll designer and producer with over 30 years experience creating real-life baby dolls. Proudly designed by Berenguer
body.description: Product Description Looking for the perfect baby doll for a child age 2 or older? Know someone who would absolutely love a realistic newborn doll gift set? Wouldn’t it feel great to enhance the oh-so-cute playtime experience with an 8-piece layette set for dress-up fun? If you answered, “Yes!” to any of these questions, then you will absolutely cherish the La Newborn Nursery doll by JC Toys!The La Newborn collection of baby dolls were hand-designed in Spain by the Designed by Berenguer team, an award-winning group of the world’s best doll designers. Every La Newborn was originally hand-sculpted by a doll design specialist, so the quality level is beyond anything you’ve ever seen. Dolls from the La Newborn collection represent precious moments in a newborn’s life, like the first tired yawn or tear drop. This La Newborn baby doll, the Nursery, flawlessly imitates that once-in-a-lifetime leaving the hospital experience thanks to her intricately detailed dimples, folds, life-like wrinkles, and 8-piece layette gift set.People all over the world love our dolls for all kinds of reasons. Baby dolls encourage social interaction as well as fine-motor development in children. Dolls also help you introduce an upcoming new baby in the family to a young child. Children especially love baby dolls because of the infinite amount of playtime possibilities.The Nursery La Newborn is manufactured directly by our company, JC Toys, a world leader in doll manufacturing. JC Toys is a family run and operated business with origins dating back to 1982 in south-east Spain - one of the top major toy-making and design centers in the world. Today, you can find 100s dolls, playtime accessories, and more by JC Toys. Add smiles to a young child’s face today by adding this Nursery La Newborn to your cart now, so it can be ready for checkout and shipment asap - thank you! From the Manufacturer 2 years & up. La Newborn 14" is so lifelike. The realistic and beautiful expressions make this adorable doll unique.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cutest baby doll face ever! Made for lying down or cradled position.
reviews.reviewText: Love this little guy's impy smile! He's so cute!This is a well crafted baby doll that I bought for my toddler. All of the features are really beautiful...dimple-y arms and legs, baby rolls...so we'll detailed! My tot loves taking the baby's hat on and off...he thinks it's hilarious.Important to note: the baby's neck is positioned as though an arm is underneath it at all times and there is no way to adjust positions...so when you try to sit the baby up in a high chair it looks super awkward with the baby staring down at his own feet. If you have the baby lying down or held like a newborn, he looks perfectly fine, but he would look super strange in a highchair or umbrella stroller. I guess it's appropriate because the doll looks like a newborn, but it does limit it's okay capabilities a tad.This is a beautifully made doll though. High quality and perfect weight for a toddler to care for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A beautiful doll that is just right for my grand daughter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars La Newborn doll
reviews.reviewText: The La Newborn doll in the cradle is so beautiful! It looks like a real baby! I can hardly wait to give it to my little great granddaughter for Christmas!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My girls love this doll so much! I had to buy a second so they stopped fighting!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So Realistic! Great deal!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this doll as a last minute gift for my 2 year old granddaughter. When I opened the Amazon box,I was really impressed with the quality of the set ,both the details on the doll and the well made clothing. When I helped my granddaughter remove the doll from the packaging, I was blown away when I saw the incredibly detailed fingers, toes, belly button, neck wrinkles and more! My granddaughter holds this baby so differently and much more carefully than she holds her other baby dolls. The only disappointing thing was that the child size bracelet was too tight on her chubby toddler wrists.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks so real! I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This baby was actually purchased for my mother-in-law who has Demetia and sundowners. She loves it and carries it around with her all the time. I am sure this doll would be a great little baby for any little girl. It is well made and so are the cloths and accessories that it comes with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doll is right size for 4 year old, nice set of accessories, soft material.
My daughters love it.. The doll is beautiful

reviews.reviewTitle: Mi hija está satisfecha, lo pedí con temor, pero cumplieron con lo que ofrecen. Gracias.
reviews.reviewText: Es exactamente como la describen. Muy satisfecho.
Ma petite fille adore sa nouvelle poupée. C'est réellement un beau jouet. Ressemble à un nouveau-né.Qualité-prix, ça dépasse mes attentes, vraiment pas dispendieux. Les petites filles adorent !
Regalo di Natale, la mia bimba l’ha gradita moltissimo. Per dimensioni e fattezze sembra proprio un neonato.
